name: credit-card-validator
description: Check the validity and return the credit card's type (Visa, MasterCard, Maestro...)

scripts.postinstall: mkdir ./dist && browserify src/index.js --standalone credit-card-validator -o dist/credit-card-validator.js && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs dist/credit-card-validator.js -o dist/credit-card-validator.min.js

author: Yestudent
